meta-review.comment: God of War Ragnarok: Valhalla brings a surprising and engaging addition to the series, delving boldly into Kratos' past while providing a rewarding gameplay experience. The roguelite mode allows the game's excellent combat to shine brighter than ever, complemented by a meaningful and introspective narrative. This DLC is a must-play for fans of the series, and it's free, so there's no reason to miss out. Santa Monica Studios has delivered an impressive expansion that skillfully blends personal storytelling and addictive gameplay, making it a standout addition to the God of War universe.
